Detailed Description

All trace routines provided by the PCL library.

Most of those are provided as callbacks that should be implemented by delegates of the classes that inherit from ICISMPDevice.

Enumeration Type Documentation

- (enum) SEVERITY_LOG_LEVELS

Severity Levels.

Enumerator
SEV_DEBUG 

Debug Message

SEV_INFO 

Information Message

SEV_TRACE 

Trace Message

SEV_WARN 

Warning Message

SEV_ERROR 

Error Message

SEV_FATAL 

Fatal Error Message

SEV_UNKOWN 

Unknown-Severity Message

Function Documentation

- (void) logEntry: (NSString *)  message
withSeverity: (int)  severity 

Provides log traces and their severities.

This callback may be called by the library from an arbitray thread. So the application should not perform a long or a blocking task within this callback.

Parameters
messageThe logged message
severityThe severity of the logged message (one of the values defined within SEVERITY_LOG_LEVELS)
- (void) logSerialData: (NSData *)  data
incomming: (BOOL)  isIncoming 

Provides traces of serial data exchanged with the terminal.

This callback may be called by the library from an arbitray thread. So the application should not perform a long or a blocking task within this callback.

Parameters
dataThe serial data
isIncomingYES if the data comes to the iDevice, NO in the other case
+ (NSString*) severityLevelString: (int)  level

Return a static string corresponding to the severity level.

The string returned will have the form

  • "SEV_DEBUG"
  • "SEV_INFO "
  • "SEV_TRACE"
  • "SEV_WARN "
  • "SEV_ERROR"
  • "SEV_FATAL"
  • "SEV_UNKOWN"
+ (const char*) severityLevelStringA: (int)  level

Return a static char* corresponding to the severity level.
